titleStmt.title: Blurt master-constable. Or The Spaniards night-walke As it hath bin sundry times priuately acted by the Children of Paules.
titleStmt.author: Dekker, Thomas, ca. 1572-1632.
Middleton, Thomas, d. 1627, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by Edward Allde] for Henry Rockytt, and are to be solde at the long shop vnder S. Mildreds Church in the Poultry,

notesStmt.note: Variously attributed to Thomas Dekker and to Thomas Middleton.
Running title reads: Blurt master constable.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: the long shop vnder S. Mildreds Church in the Poultry
